content: I'm using the Android app and this is really frustrating. It's faster to open a new browser tab, load the entire zulip app, and click on 'Direct messages' than it is to wait for them to load in the app.
(the zulip app in browser has other issues, like closing emoji popup windows as soon as you open them)
And while I'm ranting it's really difficult to create a new thread on mobile, you have to open an existing thread and edit the title before responding with a new message
Every once in a while, I've noticed that the Android app stops loading threads quickly, and I have to close and reopen it.
After I do, it goes back to loading them quickly.
